subject: config(interest-api): configure VITE_INTEREST_API_URL for tool-till-tees endpoint
body:
Set the interest notification API URL to the deployed Vercel endpoint
at tool-till-tees.vercel.app. Updated .env.example with the actual URL,
added the env var injection to the GitHub Actions deploy workflow via
repository secret, and documented the GitHub Actions secret setup step.

Tags: config, ci, docs, interest-api

Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
